name: ROCK PAPER SCISSORS (Cherlie)
description:
sit back and watch some very intense game of Rock Paper Scissors

!!THIS IS NOT MY IDEA!!!
I SIMPLY MADE IT TO HAVE FUN WITH MY FRIENDS
IF YOU ARE THAT COOL DUDE ON TIK TOK WHO CAME UP WITH 
THE IDEA AND WANT ME TO TAKE IT DOWN THAN PLEASE SAY SO

you can set the amount of rocks papers and scissors there is no limit so be careful or your computer will hate you
